<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oil of Swiftness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2075)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 87 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Anoint a weapon with _oil of swiftness_, which hisses upon application, to give it the benefits of the _[speed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=304)_ rune for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Oil of Swiftness
